Name: SAM_SMARAT
Title: Like a God
Review: Prayer wheel is just like god for ladakhi and tibetan people. they have strong believe in prayer wheels. when i was in leh ladakh I see everywhere Prayer wheel. Prayer wheel is like good luck wish.

Name: Samarth T
Title: Prayer wheels
Review: prayer wheel will just like a godfather ladakhi and Tibetan people. Prayer wheels is not just a toy but they are strong believe in prayer wheels. You can see everywhere in Leh Ladakh. You can see lots of prayer wheels. You can see every monastery and temples lots of prayer wheels. Prayer wheels is most important in Leh Ladakh. Thank you. ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

Name: Vaibhav_Tailor
Title: Like a Goodluck Wish
Review: Prayer wheel is the most important thing in ladakhi culture they revolve it every time when  they are passing by.there are lot of prayer wheels in the town even beside the road when we were traveling by car our driver took the car around that prayer wheel,its like a goodluck wish

Name: Aartichand
Title: Beautiful Prayer Wheel
Review: Just off the Leh market this is a quiet space with a well built Prayer Wheel. Stop by and enjoy its intricate design. It is actually very well made.

Name: Peregrineri
Title: Exceptionally beautiful prayer wheel
Review: If you are in the neighborhood or on your way up to Shanti Stupa, do stop there. This is one of the most beautiful prayer wheels I've seen in Ladakh. There are, of course, lots of prayer wheels around Leh, but this is my favorite. It's not old, just beautiful.
